text: Matt Beresford Poore (1 June 1930 â€“ 11 June 2020) was an international New Zealand cricketer. He played 14 Tests for New Zealand in the 1950s. He was born in Christchurch. Poore died at a retirement home in North Shore, Auckland, on 11 June 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Matt Poore
